verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> is <S%H5493>taken<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from being a <S%H5892>city,<s%> and it shall be a <S%H4654>ruinous<s%> <S%H4596>heap.<s%>

The <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> are <S%H5800>forsaken:<s%> they shall be for <S%H5739>flocks,<s%> which shall <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall make them <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

The <S%H4013>fortress<s%> also shall <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> from <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> and the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of <S%H758>Syria:<s%> they shall be as the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall be made <S%H1809>thin,<s%> and the <S%H4924>fatness<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall wax <S%H7329>lean.<s%>

And it shall be as when the <S%H7105>harvestman<s%> <S%H622>gathers<s%> the <S%H7054>corn,<s%> and <S%H7114>reaps<s%> the <S%H7641>ears<s%> with his <S%H2220>arm;<s%> and it shall be as he that <S%H3950>gathers<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

Yet <S%H5955>gleaning<s%> grapes shall be <S%H7604>left<s%> in it, as the <S%H5363>shaking<s%> of an <S%H2132>olive<s%> tree, <S%H8147>two<s%> or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1620>berries<s%> in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the uppermost <S%H534>bough,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> or <S%H2568>five<s%> in the outmost <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H5585>branches<s%> thereof, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

At that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H8159>look<s%> to his <S%H6213>Maker,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall have <S%H7200>respect<s%> to the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he shall not <S%H8159>look<s%> to the <S%H4196>altars,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H7200>respect<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> his <S%H676>fingers<s%> have <S%H6213>made,<s%> either the <S%H842>groves,<s%> or the <S%H2553>images.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall his <S%H4581>strong<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> be as a <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H2793>bough,<s%> and an uppermost <S%H534>branch,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and there shall be <S%H8077>desolation.<s%>

<S%H3588>Because<s%> you have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> and have not been <S%H2142>mindful<s%> of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of your <S%H4581>strength,<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall you <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H5194>plants,<s%> and shall <S%H2232>set<s%> it with <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H2156>slips:<s%>

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> shall you make your <S%H5194>plant<s%> to <S%H7735>grow,<s%> and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> shall you make your <S%H2233>seed<s%> to <S%H6524>flourish:<s%> but the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> shall be a <S%H5067>heap<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2470>grief<s%> and of <S%H605>desperate<s%> <S%H3511>sorrow.<s%>

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> which make a <S%H1993>noise<s%> like the <S%H1993>noise<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas;<s%> and to the <S%H7588>rushing<s%> of <S%H3816>nations,<s%> that make a <S%H7582>rushing<s%> like the <S%H7588>rushing<s%> of <S%H3524>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters!<s%>

The <S%H3816>nations<s%> shall <S%H7582>rush<s%> like the <S%H7588>rushing<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters:<s%> but God shall <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> them, and they shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H4801>far<s%> off, and shall be <S%H7291>chased<s%> as the <S%H4671>chaff<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and like a <S%H1534>rolling<s%> thing <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5492>whirlwind.<s%>

And <S%H2009>behold<s%> at <S%H6256>evening<s%> <S%H6153><s%> <S%H1091>trouble;<s%> and <S%H2962>before<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> he is not. <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of them that <S%H8154>spoil<s%> us, and the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of them that <S%H962>rob<s%> us.
